Sun, 10 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Te Ngare Te Ake Ake, pictured on the morning of trial before guilty pleas were entered, has been sent to prison after holding his ex at his rural property and assaulting her over two days.

This is what it’s like to have both – Leanne Maskell https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/ive-lived-with-adhd-and-autism-all-my-life-this-is-what-its-like-to-have-both-leanne-马斯克尔/BABUNGDRXRD6PIYAVTZJZEZ7GA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/ive-lived-with-adhd-and-autism-all-my-life-this-is-what-its-like-to-have-both-leanne-马斯克尔/BABUNGDRXRD6PIYAVTZJZEZ7GA/ Leanne MaskellTelegraph: Experts are learning that autism and ADHD often go hand-in-hand. ‘Shrinkflation’ is becoming more common but what is it? - The Front Page https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/shrinkflation-is-becoming-more-common-but-what-is-it-the-front-page/HHA3R7OPFVDC3G3RKBBNOZNVAY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/shrinkflation-is-becoming-more-common-but-what-is-it-the-front-page/HHA3R7OPFVDC3G3RKBBNOZNVAY/ Chelsea DanielsEver feel like you’re getting less bang for your buck at the supermarket? Sun, 10 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 "Shrinkflation" is a tactic by which companies give you less product for the same price.
